verses.text: Thus all the \w work|strong="H4399"\w* that \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* for the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* was \w finished|strong="H7999"\w*: and \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w brought|strong="H0935"\w* in \add all\add* the \w things|strong="H6944"\w* that \w David|strong="H1732"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w* had \w dedicated|strong="H6944"\w*; and the \w silver|strong="H3701"\w*, and the \w gold|strong="H2091"\w*, and all the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w*, \w put|strong="H5414"\w* he among the \w treasures|strong="H0214"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

¶ Then \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and all the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w tribes|strong="H4294"\w*, the \w chief|strong="H5387"\w* of the \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, unto \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, to bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, which \add is\add* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*.

Wherefore all the \w men|strong="H0376"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w assembled|strong="H6950"\w* themselves unto the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* in the \w feast|strong="H2282"\w* which \add was\add* in the \w seventh|strong="H7637"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*.
And all the \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w*; and the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* took \w up|strong="H5375"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*.

And they brought \w up|strong="H5927"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w* of the \w congregation|strong="H4150"\w*, and all the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w vessels|strong="H3627"\w* that \add were\add* in the \w tabernacle|strong="H0168"\w*, these did the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \add and\add* the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* bring \w up|strong="H5927"\w*.

Also \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, and all the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* that were \w assembled|strong="H3259"\w* unto him \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, \w sacrificed|strong="H2076"\w* \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* and \w oxen|strong="H1241"\w*, which could not be \w told|strong="H5608"\w* nor \w numbered|strong="H4487"\w* for \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w*.

And the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* brought \w in|strong="H0935"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto his \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, to the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w* of the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, into the \w most|strong="H6944"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place, even\add* under the \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* of the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w*:

For the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* \add their\add* \w wings|strong="H3671"\w* over the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* of the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, and the \w cherubims|strong="H3742"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* and the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* thereof \w above|strong="H4605"\w*.

And they drew \w out|strong="H0748"\w* the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* \add of the ark\add*, that the \w ends|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w staves|strong="H0905"\w* were \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* from the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w oracle|strong="H1687"\w*; but they were not \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w without|strong="H2351"\w*. And there it is unto this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 5.9 \ft there…: or, they are there\f*

\add There was\add* nothing in the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* save the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w tables|strong="H3871"\w* which \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w put|strong="H5414"\w* \add therein\add* at \w Horeb|strong="H2722"\w*, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w made|strong="H3772"\w* \add a covenant\add* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when they came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*.\f + \fr 5.10 \ft when the \+nd LORD\+nd*: or, where, etc\f*

¶ And it came to pass, when the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* were come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \add place:\add* (for all the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \add that were\add* \w present|strong="H4672"\w* were \w sanctified|strong="H6942"\w*, \add and\add* did not \add then\add* \w wait|strong="H8104"\w* by \w course|strong="H4256"\w*:\f + \fr 5.11 \ft present: Heb. found\f*

Also the \w Levites|strong="H3881"\w* \add which were\add* the \w singers|strong="H7891"\w*, all of them of \w Asaph|strong="H0623"\w*, of \w Heman|strong="H1968"\w*, of \w Jeduthun|strong="H3038"\w*, with their \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and their \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, \add being\add* \w arrayed|strong="H3847"\w* in white \w linen|strong="H0948"\w*, having \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w* and \w psalteries|strong="H5035"\w* and \w harps|strong="H3658"\w*, \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* at the east \w end|strong="H4217"\w* of the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, and with them an \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* and \w twenty|strong="H6242"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w sounding|strong="H2690"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w*:)

It came even to pass, as the \w trumpeters|strong="H2690"\w* and \w singers|strong="H7891"\w* \add were\add* as \w one|strong="H0259"\w*, to make \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* to be \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* in \w praising|strong="H1984"\w* and \w thanking|strong="H3034"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and when they lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* \add their\add* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* with the \w trumpets|strong="H2689"\w* and \w cymbals|strong="H4700"\w* and \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w musick|strong="H7892"\w*, and \w praised|strong="H1984"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add saying\add*, For \add he is\add* \w good|strong="H2896"\w*; for his \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* \add endureth\add* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: that \add then\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* was \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* with a \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*, \add even\add* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*;

So that the \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* not \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* to \w minister|strong="H8334"\w* by \w reason|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w*: for the \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* had \w filled|strong="H4390"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
